{{velocity filter="none"}} {{html clean="false" wiki="true"}} ## ## Join Curriki Page ## @programming ## #macro(formfield $fieldname $text $mandatory)
$msg.get("joincurriki.fields.$fieldname") #if($mandatory == true)#asterix()#end
#if($text!="")
$text
#end
#if($mandatory == true) #verbatim_start #verbatim_end #end #if($fieldname=="xwikiname") #elseif($fieldname == "password") ## if is xwikiname elseif #elseif($fieldname == "password2") ## if is xwikiname #elseif($fieldname == "email") ## if is xwikiname elseif #else $userdoc.display($fieldname, "edit") ##$userdoc.displayTooltip($fieldname) #end ## if is xwikiname else
## register_field
## register_block #end ## macro formfield ## #macro(formfield_sortedlist $fieldname $text $mandatory)
$msg.get("joincurriki.fields.$fieldname") #if($mandatory == true)#asterix()#end
#if($text!="")
$text
#end
#if($mandatory == true) #end
## register_field
## register_block #end ## End Macros ## ## ## First check if this is a submission #if($request.xwikiname) #set($reg = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("Registration.RegisterGroovy")) #set($junk = $reg.setObjects($xwiki, $context, $msg)) #set($result = $reg.createAccount($request)) #else #set($result = false) #end #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use($doc.fullName, {'minify':false})) ## Either submission failed, or no submission #if(!$result||($result==false)) = $msg.get("joincurriki.registerToJoinCurriki") = #set($message = $reg.getMessage()) #if($message && $message!="")
$message
#if($reg.getMessageCode()=="validation_failed") #foreach($error in $context.validationStatus.errors) $!error
#end #end
#end #set($userdoc = $xwiki.getDocument("XWiki.XWikiUserTemplate")) #set($ok = $userdoc.addObjectFromRequest("XWiki.XWikiUsers")) $userdoc.use("XWiki.XWikiUsers") #if(!$userdoc.show_contact || $userdoc.show_contact == "") #set($junk = ($userdoc.set('show_contact', '1'))) #end ##$msg.get("joincurriki.enterRequestedInfo")

$msg.get('joincurriki.text.titre1')

#formfield('civility' $msg.get('joincurriki.civility.text') true) #formfield('first_name' $msg.get('joincurriki.first_name.text') true) #formfield('last_name' $msg.get('joincurriki.last_name.text') true) #formfield('email' $msg.get('joincurriki.enterValidEmail') true) #formfield_sortedlist('country' $msg.get('joincurriki.country.text') true)

$msg.get('joincurriki.text.titre2')

$msg.get('joincurriki.text.info2')

#formfield('xwikiname' $msg.get('joincurriki.chooseYourCommunityName') true) #formfield('password' $msg.get('joincurriki.enterPassword') true) #formfield('password2' $msg.get('joincurriki.fields.password2') true) #set($ppurl = $xwiki.getURL("Main.Politique+de+confidentialite")) #set($TOS = $xwiki.getURL("Main.Conditions+generales+d+utilisation")) ## FIXME: fix the actual terms of use and privacy and uncomment this when done. FTM these are commented because they link to bad things ## and a hidden field is added so that registration is successful

$msg.get('joincurriki.text.mandatory')

$msg.get("joincurriki.text.disclaimer")
